mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bb_rooms_supports (staff_id, room_id, support_id, remark, price) VALUES
(#{staff.id}, #{support.roomId}, #{support.supportId},#{support.remark},#{support.price})
mapper.select: SELECT bb_rooms_supports.id, bb_supports.name as name, bb_supports.cover as cover, bb_supports.unit as unit, price FROM bb_rooms_supports LEFT JOIN bb_supports ON bb_rooms_supports.support_id = bb_supports.id where bb_rooms_supports.room_id = #{room}
